about_the_game:
Introducing the Summer Fun DLC Pack! With these new items, you can create the perfect outdoor setting for your picnics, gatherings, and cozy moments. The wooden furniture is available in two stylish color options, allowing you to customize your picnic area to match your unique taste. So, grab your delicious food, and let the Summer Fun Pack transform your picnics into unforgettable memories.

What’s in the pack?
- Wooden Picnic Bench
- Wooden Picnic Chair
- Wooden Picnic Table
- Picnic Umbrella with Table Set
- Picnic Umbrella

Set up your perfect outdoor gathering!
